@graph.name: Shopify Pricing Guide

@graph.browserRequirements: Modern web browser with JavaScript enabled
featureList: Cost estimation for apps and themes

@graph.name: How to Choose the Right Shopify Pricing Plan
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to selecting the optimal Shopify plan based on business size, features needed, and budget constraints.

step.name: Assess Your Business Size
step.text: Determine if you're a startup ($5-39/month), growing business ($105/month), large business ($399/month), or enterprise ($2000+/month).

step.name: Calculate Transaction Volume
step.text: Estimate monthly transactions to determine optimal transaction fee tier: 2.9%, 2.6%, or 2.4% + 30¢.

step.name: Evaluate Staff Requirements
step.text: Count team members needing access: Starter (N/A), Basic (2), Shopify (5), Advanced (15), Plus (unlimited).

step.name: Consider Additional Costs
step.text: Factor in apps ($10-200/month), premium themes ($140-180), domain ($14/year), and payment processing fees.

mainEntity.name: How much does Shopify cost per month?

acceptedAnswer.text: Shopify plans range from $5/month (Starter) to $2000+/month (Plus). Most businesses choose Basic ($39), Shopify ($105), or Advanced ($399) plans.
Transaction fees vary by plan: Basic (2.9% + 30¢), Shopify (2.6% + 30¢), Advanced (2.4% + 30¢). Third-party payment providers add 0.5-2% extra fees.

mainEntity.name: Which Shopify plan is best for small businesses?

acceptedAnswer.text: Basic Shopify ($39/month) is ideal for small businesses, offering full ecommerce functionality, 2 staff accounts, and 77% shipping discounts.

mainEntity.name: What additional costs should I expect with Shopify?

acceptedAnswer.text: Additional costs include apps ($10-200/month), premium themes ($140-180 one-time), domain registration ($14/year), and potential third-party payment fees.

@graph.name: Shopify Pricing Guide - Complete Cost Breakdown 2024
@graph.description: Comprehensive guide to Shopify pricing plans, fees, and costs. Compare all plans from $5 to $2000+ per month with detailed feature analysis.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Transaction Fees
hasDefinedTerm.description: Percentage-based fees charged on each sale, varying by plan: 2.9% (Basic), 2.6% (Shopify), 2.4% (Advanced) plus 30¢ per transaction.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Staff Accounts
hasDefinedTerm.description: Number of team members who can access Shopify admin: 2 (Basic), 5 (Shopify), 15 (Advanced), unlimited (Plus).

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify Payments
hasDefinedTerm.description: Native payment gateway with no additional transaction fees beyond standard credit card processing rates.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shipping Discounts
hasDefinedTerm.description: Reduced rates with major carriers: up to 77% (Basic), up to 88% (Shopify/Advanced plans).

@graph.name: Shopify Plan Use Cases
@graph.description: Real-world scenarios for choosing different Shopify pricing plans

itemListElement.name: Social Media Sellers
itemListElement.description: Influencers and artists using Starter Plan ($5/month) to sell through Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok integration.

itemListElement.name: Small Business Startups
itemListElement.description: New ecommerce businesses using Basic Plan ($39/month) for full online store with essential features and 2 staff accounts.

itemListElement.name: Growing Mid-Size Businesses
itemListElement.description: Scaling companies using Shopify Plan ($105/month) for advanced reporting, 5 staff accounts, and lower transaction fees.

itemListElement.name: Large Volume Merchants
itemListElement.description: High-volume businesses using Advanced Plan ($399/month) for lowest fees, 15 staff accounts, and international tax calculations.

itemListElement.name: Enterprise Corporations
itemListElement.description: Large enterprises using Shopify Plus ($2000+/month) for unlimited customization, dedicated support, and multi-store management.
